name: Lizardquest-Alien waters
description:
Hello, i am the developer of this game Lizardquest-Alien waters ,
and as we all like The Role Playing games and Adventures, this game is
an Adventure game , I try to make an interesting
and fun game, simple to play in the beautiful world.

As an Adventure game with different places to go. The Story in the game is about the
Lizard, who came from the sea , the home, to discover new Adventures and secrets,
and your choices will lead him in the game, and will build his reality,
the game is not an open world adventure, but there is a portal to go back to home,
and choose where to go next and what path of adventure to choose.

There are 9 slots for weapons you can have at any time, but you can choose what
to keep and what to change for other weapon, but the focus in the game is to move around,
and not always to shoot something.
Controls are standard:
W,A,S,D to move, Ctrl to crouch, Space to jump, E to use, 1-9 weapons, 0-hide weapon,
Mouse left to atak, Mouse right to look around, and Mouse wheel to change weapons,
Shift to sprint.

I know that i tried to fix mistakes in the game,
but in case of an error Uninstall and Reinstalling usually helps,
thanks for understanding, and have fun!
